item.description:
Beau and I have been wanting to check out the "new" White Trail at Musquash so I thought I'd post it for anyone free that day who would like to join us. I can post another day during the week too if others show interest.

Parking is at the trailhead on Faucher Road in Londonderry. It's all new to me so come explore as we discover this most recently blazed trail. The website states that the White Trail adds 1.5 miles to the existing trail system. I like to go at least 3 miles when I take Beau out so we can go on another trail from there if everyone is game.

Check it out at: http://londonderrytra...

Ticks have been pretty common here so you may want to start using Deet, etc.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Explore the White Trail at Musquash
